text_block_list.text: "Be realistic, Tap."
text_block_list.name: American Friend

text_block_list.text:
(I'm sick of hearing that. 
I'm just going to Japan, that's all.)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
"You might regret this, Tap. Chasing your 'dreams' to Japan? 
Come on, we're not kids anymore. 
You don't have any friends over there, either!"
text_block_list.name: American Friend

text_block_list.text:
(I'm not giving up on my dreams. 
There's no chance I'll ever give up this adventure!)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Pardon! What is there to eat around here?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: A-ah... Aimu so-ri...? Ai kyanto supi-ku ingurisshu...
text_block_list.name: Passerby

text_block_list.text:
(I don't need any friends. I don't need to get my words across. 
All that matters is that I'm here...)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: (...I'm fine by myself.)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Ah... You... alone? Come, eat... together?
text_block_list.name: Girl with pigtails

text_block_list.text:
Hey, you're just speaking Japanese! 
Um... Ramen, eat?
text_block_list.name: Girl with a ponytail

text_block_list.text:
(Even though I was all alone, they taught me some Japanese. 
They took me along to play. They became... my friends!)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: (Sorry!! I was wrong after all! Having friends is better than solitude! Being alone was so boring!)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: (I'm going to live life laughing together with my friends!)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, my mom is taking me to Hokkaido, so... 
I don't think we'll see each other again... Bye-bye, Tap.
text_block_list.name: Girl with a ponytail

text_block_list.text:
(I can't believe it... Snatched away by such fickle things 
like time, or circumstances...!)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
(I've had it with "reality". I'll fight it head-on. 
It's my journey, my desire!)
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Listen up! I'm going to absolutely crush the biggest of races! The Takarazuka Kinen, Japan Cup, and the Arima Kinen... I'll win them all!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: ... Tap!
text_block_list.name: Girl with pigtails

text_block_list.text: But! You have to be famous to enter them, right? Then I'll become a record breaker! I'll make everyone go wild!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
I'll become someone the likes of which the world has never seen! 
I'll help myself to records, popularity and above all: Adventure!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: And then! I'll be famous the world over! Sponsors, commercials, all the money will come to me!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Well, Trainer? What do you think? How much money do you think the world's best horsegirl will bring in?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: More than anyone else, I bet!

text_block_list.text: Exactly! With that much money, I'll build that castle in no time!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
... Tap! 
I get what you mean, but there's no way...
text_block_list.name: Girl with pigtails

text_block_list.text: Come. I'll take you to my castle!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Being a kid or an adult. Reality or ideals. 
Don't waste your time on these pointless things! 
I won't accept your farewell!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
I'll make sure to build that castle where we can have fun forever! 
All you need to do is trust in me, and tell me you'll see me again!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
You, Trainer, let's make a killing! 
And we'll make your dream come true while we're at it!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
and going overseas, too...?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I firmly grasp the hand that's right in front of me. The hand 
of the horsegirl who said she'd make my dream come true. 
The dream I was told was impossible.
choice_data_list: <size=38>You make it sound like you're fulfilled mine.</size>
<size=38>You make it sound like you're fulfilled mine.</size>

text_block_list.text:
All I need to make our dreams come true is money. 
And a trainer who aims for the top, too!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
This is beyond reckless. But her confident smile... 
She might really be suited to become the ruler of the races.

A few days later. Tap Dance City is about to do a mock race 
with fellow classmates and upperclassmen 
in the lead-up to her debut.

Argh! 5th place again! How many times in a row is that? 
I thought it'd be a piece of cake with your strategy!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: Well, let's try to be a little realistic.

text_block_list.text:
We've been working together, but the only races she's won so far 
are the ones with her friends. We're still lacking in both 
power and strategy for the Twinkle Series.
choice_data_list: Let's go over some data for now.
Let's go over some data for now.

text_block_list.text:
We brainstormed with data about her future opponents. 
And data about herself too, because we need to find a plan 
that brings out her best.

From the data I gathered during her mock races, I noticed something. 
Her biggest weakness is is being thrown off her pace by others.
choice_data_list: (She has to stay in her comfort zone.)
(She has to stay in her comfort zone.)

text_block_list.text: Hmm? What's up, Trainer?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: <size=39>I was just thinking how confident you are.</size>
<size=39>I was just thinking how confident you are.</size>

text_block_list.text:
Heh... What's a journey without riding the turbulent waves? 
I'll leave the steering to you.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
So they managed to find one, eh? I wonder if they'll be okay with 
Tap Dance City. She's been losing a lot, and her debut is coming up...
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Bwah-ha-ha! I'm sure they're learning their lesson! 
It's hard to stay motivated if your horsegirl keeps losing!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B

text_block_list.text: ... Are we really seein' the same thing, with comments like that?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
... 
Tap Dance City, Classic Races, Derb――
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
No, she should already be in 'Parcae'. She should have 
nothing to do with my 'seven centimeters'... Surely.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: ――A single encounter may be able to change fate.

Tap Dance City's decision to come to Japan was caused 
by Katsuragi Ace. Then, she met new friends in Japan 
and developed her dream of building a castle.
Every encounter just like that, shifts fate in a new direction.
I arrived in... Japan. Ahead of schedule, even...
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ――Sometimes even in an unexpected direction...
